original_text: And the priest shall take of the blood of the sin offering, and put it upon the posts of the house, and upon the four corners of the settle of the altar, and upon the posts of the gate of the inner court.
korean_text: 제사장이 그 속죄제 희생제물의 피를 가져다가 성전 문설주와 제단 아래층 네 모퉁이와 안뜰 문설주에 바를 것이요

sentences.original_text: And the priest shall take of the blood
and put it upon the posts of the house
and upon the four corners of the settle of the altar
and upon the posts of the gate of the inner court
